changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: Create REPORT_OUTPUT_TYPES

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: GRANT SELECT ON "GPFD"."REPORT_OUTPUT_TYPES" TO "ANY_REPORT"

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: Create REPORTS

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS ADD FOREIGN KEY (REPORT_OUTPUT_TYPE) REFERENCES REPORT_OUTPUT_TYPES(id)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: GRANT SELECT ON "GPFD"."REPORTS" TO "ANY_REPORT"

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: Create REPORT_GROUPS

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORT_GROUPS ADD FOREIGN KEY (REPORT_ID) REFERENCES REPORTS(id)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: GRANT SELECT ON "GPFD"."REPORT_GROUPS" TO "ANY_REPORT"

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: Create REPORT_QUERIES

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORT_QUERIES ADD FOREIGN KEY (REPORT_ID) REFERENCES REPORTS(id)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: GRANT SELECT ON "GPFD"."REPORT_QUERIES" TO "ANY_REPORT"

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: Create FIELD_ATTRIBUTES

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.FIELD_ATTRIBUTES ADD FOREIGN KEY (REPORT_QUERY_ID) REFERENCES REPORT_QUERIES(id)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: GRANT SELECT ON "GPFD"."FIELD_ATTRIBUTES" TO "ANY_REPORT"

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: Create REPORTS_TRACKING

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS_TRACKING ADD FOREIGN KEY (REPORT_ID) REFERENCES REPORTS(id)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: GRANT SELECT ON "GPFD"."REPORTS_TRACKING" TO "ANY_REPORT"

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: drop REPORTS.REPORT_CREATOR_ID
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS DROP COLUMN REPORT_CREATOR_ID

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: drop REPORTS.REPORT_CREATOR_NAME
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS DROP COLUMN REPORT_CREATOR_NAME

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: drop REPORTS.REPORT_CREATOR_EMAIL
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS DROP COLUMN REPORT_CREATOR_EMAIL

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: make REPORTS.TEMPLATE_SECURE_DOCUMENT_ID nullable
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS MODIFY TEMPLATE_SECURE_DOCUMENT_ID NULL

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: add REPORTS.FILE_NAME
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS ADD COLUMN FILE_NAME VARCHAR(150)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: add REPORTS.ACTIVE
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS ADD COLUMN ACTIVE CHAR(1)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: make FIELD_ATTRIBUTES.COLUMN_WIDTH a double
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.FIELD_ATTRIBUTES ALTER COLUMN COLUMN_WIDTH NUMBER(6,2)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: make FIELD_ATTRIBUTES.FORMAT nullable
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.FIELD_ATTRIBUTES MODIFY FORMAT NULL

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: make REPORTS_TRACKING.REPORT_DOWNLOADED_BY nullable
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS_TRACKING MODIFY REPORT_DOWNLOADED_BY NULL

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: make REPORTS_TRACKING.REPORT_GENERATED_BY nullable
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS_TRACKING MODIFY REPORT_GENERATED_BY NULL

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: drop REPORTS_TRACKING.REPORT_GENERATED_BY
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS_TRACKING DROP COLUMN REPORT_GENERATED_BY
